quote: Many of us seem to live our lives looking for happiness. That is not always a bad thing, but it can be if we continually believe that happiness is someplace else and not in the present.
quote_letters: MANY OF US SEEM TO LIVE OUR LIVES LOOKING FOR HAPPINESS THAT IS NOT ALWAYS A BAD THING BUT IT CAN BE IF WE CONTINUALLY BELIEVE THAT HAPPINESS IS SOMEPLACE ELSE AND NOT IN THE PRESENT
